t: Avaya - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Since 2001, Avaya has sold and acquired several companies. Through Nortel's bankruptcy proceedings, assets related to their Enterprise Voice and Data business units were auctioned. Avaya placed a $900 million bid, and was announced as the winner of the assets on September 14, 2009.

Nortel sells enterprise unit to Avaya for $900 million | Reuters
s: September 14, 2009 - U.S. telecom equipment maker Avaya Inc <AVXX.UL> has emerged as the successful bidder at a bankruptcy auction for the Nortel Networks Corp <NRTLQ.PK> unit that builds corporate networks, and will pay $900 million for the business.

t: Avaya Announces Intention to Buy Nortel Enterprise
s: December 4, 2024 - After months of speculation and rumor, Avaya appears to be the "winner" in the Nortel Enterprise sweepstakes. Today Avaya announced its intent to purchase the enterprise assets of the beleaguered Nortel for approximately $475 million which is what I had predicted in the blog I posted last month.
